Title: Cracking Ice
Plot: An oversight puts Waylon and Trish in serious danger during an undercover job and Claudette is to blame.  Meanwhile, Tommy makes a drastic decision when he realizes nobody in the Barn can help him get back on the job.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual violence and offensive language
GuestStars: Natalie Zea, David Rees Snell, Michele Hicks, Paula Jai Parker, Khary Payton, Gareth Williams, RonReaco Lee, Nicki Micheaux, Matt Gerald
